name: Cargo Movement Details
query:
SELECT c.cargo_type AS "Cargo Type:Data/:80", 
c.container_no AS "Container No:Data/:100",
c.eta_date AS "ETA Date:Date/:130",
c.container_content AS "Content:Select/:80",
c.container_size AS "Container Size:Data/:80",
c.name AS "Cargo Ref:Data/:100",
t.owner AS "User:Data/:140",
t.creation AS "Inspection Start:Datetime/:130",
t.modified AS "Inspection End:Datetime/:130",
TIMEDIFF(t.modified, t.creation) AS "Inspection Time:Time/:100",
y.owner AS "User:Data/:140",
y.creation AS "Inspection Start:Datetime/:130",
y.modified AS "Inspection End:Datetime/:130",
TIMEDIFF(y.modified, y.creation) AS "Yard Time:Time/:100"
FROM `tabPre Advice` c
INNER JOIN `tabInspection` t ON t.cargo_ref = c.name
INNER JOIN `tabYard` y ON y.cargo_ref = c.name
WHERE c.docstatus < 2
AND c.cargo_type IS NOT NULL
